post.description: Applies measurement profile version to specified azure resource connections.
Initiates operations that require challenge and service context values.
Removes measurement profile version currently applied to specified azure resource connections.
Upload a new device measurement profile version

version.description: Measurement profile version to be applied.

resourceId.description: Supported azure resource to apply measurement profile versions to.

ApplyForResourceConnectionPayload.description: Payload for applying measurement profile version to a specified supported azure resource.

provisioningState.description: The status of the last operation.

measurementProfileVersions.description: List of every measurement version that was created for the given IoT device profile.

properties.description: The resource-specific properties for this resource.

DeviceProfileResource.description: A device profile that holds measurement profiles uploaded by a clean room device. Scoped under a SIM Hub.

value.description: The DeviceProfileResource items on this page

nextLink.description: The link to the next page of items

DeviceProfileResourceListResult.description: The response of a DeviceProfileResource list operation.

DeviceProfileResourceUpdate.description: The type used for update operations of the DeviceProfileResource.

challenge.description: Challenge received from the Initiate request.

serviceContext.description: Service context received from the Initiate request.

requiredAttestations.description: List of attestations the service requires from the device.

maaUrl.description: Endpoint for devices to call MAA APIs.

values.description: The values that this measurement profile holds. Used for field devices to attest against.

scopes.description: The scopes where this measurement profile should be applied on.

MeasurementProfileProperties.description: Definition for a set of measurements that were taken from a clean room device. Once approved, field devices can use it to match their measurements against and get attested if the matching succeeds.

resourceId.description: Resource of the scope. Expected to match any linked resources under SIM Hub.

state.description: The current state of the measurement in the specific scope.

MeasurementProfileResourceConnection.description: Scope where a measurement profile applies to.

challenge.description: Challenge received from the Initiate request.

serviceContext.description: Service context received from the Initiate request.

NewMeasurementProfilePayload.description: Payload for uploading new measurements from a clean room device to a device profile.

ProvisioningStateValues.description: The status of the current operation.

version.description: Measurement profile version to be removed.

resourceId.description: Supported azure resource to remove measurement profile version from.

RemoveForResourceConnectionPayload.description: Payload for removing measurement profile version applied to a specified supported azure resource.

resourceId.description: Resource identifier of the connected azure resource.

connectionString.description: Connection string used to connect to the resource, if needed.

location.description: Location where the resource is provisioned at.

provisioningState.description: The status of the last operation.

resourceConnections.description: Resources that are connected to the account.
